doc:
Ernest Lee Thomas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Lee_Thomas 0 Ernest Lee Thomas (born March 26, 1949) is an American actor. He was born in Gary, Indiana. He is best known for his role as Roger "Raj" Thomas on the 1970s ABC sitcom What's Happening!!, and its 1980s syndicated sequel, What's Happening Now!!, and for his recurring role as Mr. Omar on Everybody Hates Chris. Ernest_Lee_Thomas ( born March_26_,_1949 ) is an_American_actor . He was_born in Gary , Indiana . He is_best_known for his_role as Roger_"_Raj_"_Thomas on the_1970s_ABC_sitcom What 's_Happening !! , and its_1980s_syndicated_sequel , What 's_Happening Now !! , and for his_recurring_role as Mr._Omar on Everybody Hates Chris .
